CustomField.description: If TRUE the Opp has been 100% upfront.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for Automation reg. Chatter post on Time Entry if there is no Open Billing Mapping on the Project. The ones that have 100% Upfront = TRUE are excluded (13.10.2022 -> TPB01_TimeEntry)
CustomField.label: Is 100% Upfront?
